## WorkspaceItem.getContainer() method

Get the root container parent item, which can be one of: - [WorkspaceRoot](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/WorkspaceRoot.md) - [WorkspaceWindow](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/WorkspaceWindow.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
getContainer(): WorkspaceContainer;
```
**Returns:**

[`WorkspaceContainer`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/WorkspaceContainer.md)
